text: Volt Netherlands is a political party in the Netherlands. Volt Netherlands was established in 2018. It is a department of Volt Europa, a pan-European political party established in Italy in 2017. Volt wants to create a federal European Union with a fully operating European government and parliament. Political leader and co-founder of Volt Netherlands is Laurens Dassen. Number of seats in the 2023 elections: 2 (-1). In February 2022, Nilüfer Gündoğan was expelled from the Volt group and became an independent politician on 22 March 2022. == References == * Volt Netherlands on Parlement.com == Other websites == * Website of Volt Netherlands Category:Political parties in the Netherlands Category:2018 establishments in the Netherlands Category:European Union
title: Volt Netherlands
